content.text:
# 2003 Prince Edward Island Scott Tournament of Hearts

The 2003 Prince Edward Island Scott Tournament of Hearts, a women's curling event, was held January 17â€“20, at the Montague Curling Club in Montague, Prince Edward Island. The winning team was Team Suzanne Gaudet who represented Prince Edward Island, finished with a 10-1 round-robin record and finished 3rd overall in the page playoff at the 2003 Scott Tournament of Hearts in Kitchener, Ontario.
